author: Nando Vieira <me@fnando.com>
description: A small library to provide I18n on JavaScript.
name: i18n-js

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:js && yarn docs
scripts.build:browser: webpack --output-path ./dist/browser/ --output-filename index.js --mode production --entry ./dist/import/index.js --output-library-type var --output-library-name I18n --devtool source-map
scripts.build:import: tsc --outDir ./dist/import --module ESNext && yarn build:lodash && yarn build:make-plural
scripts.build:js: yarn build:import && yarn build:require && yarn build:browser
scripts.docs:ext: cat ext/typedoc.css | tee -a docs/v$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')/assets/style.css &> /dev/null && ruby ext/typedoc.rb
